page.title: 04A WEEKEND IN WITTON GILBERT
page.content: SATURDAYS I get up about 8:30am. Evey fortnight I play in Derwentside string orchestra from 9:30-12:00. Otherwise I either shop in Durham or read and listen to records. In the afternoons I do homework, read, listen to records , watch telly or maybe play badminton or tennis in the garden. Often my Gran or Auntie comes for tea. I go to bed at about 10-10:30pm. SUNDAYS I rise about 9.00am. We go to church for 10:00am. Usually someone comes back for coffee after mass,often a student priest who is training with my Dad (the Vicar). After dinner I do left over homework. Each fortnight Dad does a service for the mentally handicapped or he might do some gardening. We usually get visitors again. I do much the same as on Saturdays.I go to bed at about 10pm.
